description: Detects add-ins that load when Microsoft Office starts (.wll/.xll are simply .dll fit for Word or Excel).
author: NVISO
name: Microsoft Office Add-In Loading
query: (((file.path.text:*\\Microsoft\\Word\\Startup\\* AND file.path.text:*.wll)) OR ((file.path.text:*\\Microsoft\\Excel\\Startup\\* AND file.path.text:*.xll)) OR ((file.path.text:*Microsoft\\Excel\\XLSTART\\* AND file.path.text:*.xlam)) OR ((file.path.text:*\\Microsoft\\Addins\\* AND file.path.text:(*.xlam OR *.xla OR *.ppam))))
